myopenmath.statement:
Two aircraft are flying at 70 ktas. The Cessna Grand Caravan has a stall speed of \displaystyle{v}_{{s}}={78}, and the Cessna Skyhawk has a stall speed of \displaystyle{v}_{{s}}={44}.
The Cessna Grand Caravan has a maximum load factor that is G's
lower
higher
than that of Cessna Skyhawk.
Round to 3 decimal places. Note ktas is nm/hr.
